title: Worm Weather
description: Drip,drop,skip and hop.Splish, splash,sidewalk dash!It's worm weather!Join in the rainy-day fun, as kids splash through the puddles, affecting another weather enthusiast, a nearby worm. An imaginative and playful story, readers will love seeing the worm delight in the weather just as much as the kids.Worm Weather covers the concepts of ImaginationÂ  and Weather .
author: Jean Taft
